title: Firebender

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Blast a player with flames, attacking them. (3 uses)
- Create a ring of fire around a target. Attack any who dare to visit them. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Players you kill are **incinerated**, hiding their role and will, but you won't be told that information like a Janitor would. After three days, the burns sizzle out and their true role and will are revealed in the graveyard.

desc:
Post 2505
*Then, everything changed when the **fire nation** attacked.*
